description.value: You call on the Tiger God to gift you with the extraordinary senses of an apex predator. Your eyes change to match those of a tiger and a faint tiger’s growl can be heard coming from your mouth. While the Miracle is in effect, you gain +1 @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.9h82z72XGo9tfgQS]{Acute Sense} (Hearing, Sight, Smell, Taste) and the @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.x0WMGwuQzReXcQrs]{Night Vision} Talent. If you succeed with +4 SL or more, you receive the @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.ClOlztW6hH8rslbp]{Tracker} Creature Trait too.
